text: Prince Rupert is a city in British Columbia which on the Kaien Island, near the Alaskan panhandle and the Pacific Ocean to the west. Prince Rupert's transport of land, air and water is known as the transportation hub in the North Coast Regional District. The city has a ferry called the Prince Rupert Ferry Terminal, which travels to other nearby ferries. The population of the city is about 12,300 as of 2021. ==Related pages== *Prince George, British Columbia Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Prince Rupert, British Columbia
